comments_since_last_sample.body:
A landlord that doesn't even allow shelving for books... tsk tsk... But what a great redesign, it looks lovely and cozy. Great job!
I have to admit, the best part of the video was James. We need more James.
This may be my favorite S.Fix episode so far!! (And I've binged them all!) Sooo glad you changed the bedding. I literally gasped when you revealed it- its perfect!!
